message: I'm feeling generous, Bob.  Let's split it 90/10, you get the first 100k!
Your turn, Alice.  I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor.  Don't forget, the clock is ticking and the value is decreasing!
Bob, you're being greedy!  I'm offering you 300k, but the next round is yours and you'll be losing a lot more than 20%!  Think about it.
Alice, let's be reasonable. This is my final offer. A 55/45 split seems fair considering the time pressure.  Take it or leave it.
